DownScaling.description: An AutoScalingThresholds object with the downscaling threshold configuration. If the load falls below these thresholds for a specified amount of time, AWS OpsWorks stops a specified number of instances.

Enable.description: Enables load-based auto scaling for the layer.

UpScaling.description: An AutoScalingThresholds object with the upscaling threshold configuration. If the load exceeds these thresholds for a specified amount of time, AWS OpsWorks starts a specified number of instances.
